channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- ABB eSOMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- ABB eSOMS

item.title: CVE-2018-14805|2024-08-05T09:38:13.952Z -- ics-cert -- abb%20esoms
item.description: ABB eSOMS version 6.0.2 may allow unauthorized access to the system when LDAP is set to allow anonymous authentication, and specific key values within the eSOMS web.config file are present. Both conditions are required to exploit this vulnerability.
